briefTitle: A Long-term Follow-up Study (ZOE-LTFU) of Two Studies 110390 (ZOSTER-006) and 113077 (ZOSTER-022) to Assess the Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity Persistence of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Subunit (HZ/su) Vaccine and Assessment of 1 or 2 Additional Doses in Two Subgroups of Older Adults
officialTitle: Efficacy, Safety and Immunogenicity of GSK Biologicals' HZ/su Vaccine GSK1437173A in a Phase IIIb, Open-label, Long-term Follow-up Study (ZOE-LTFU) of Studies 110390/113077 (ZOSTER-006/022) and Assessment of Additional Doses in Older Adults
summary: The purpose of this study was a long-term follow-up of the two studies 110390 and 113077 (ZOSTER-006/022) to assess the efficacy, safety, and immunogenicity persistence of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster subunit (HZ/su) vaccine and included an assessment of 1 or 2 additional doses in two subgroups of older adults.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Having at Least One Confirmed Herpes Zoster (HZ) Case During the Total Duration of ZOSTER-049:EXT 006-022 Study, Overall
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: During the total duration of ZOSTER-049:EXT 006-022 study (From Month 0 to Month 72)
